overview: The film revolves around Nadia (Suheir Ramzi), who is hiding Tawfiq (Farouk al-Fishawi), who is outlawed after being forced to help him. The police discover this, and Nadia is arrested for questioning. Tawfiq remains a fugitive between Repentance of conscience and hope to escape from prison.
title: تحقيق مع مواطنه
